input_email_body:
Subject: Inquiry on Billing Options for MongoDB

Hello Customer Support, I am writing to get details on the billing plans for integrating MongoDB with your project management SaaS platform. Could you kindly elaborate on the available plans and their associated costs? I would also be grateful for any information on potential discounts or special offers You can reach me at maria.gonzalez@shop.es.. Moreover, I would like to know if there are any usage limitations or restrictions when MongoDB is integrated with your platform My name is David Kim.. I appreciate your time and assistance and look forward to your response. Best regards.
